thread.section_title: Spier Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Stellenbosch, South Africa) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Perfect spot for a family getaway
thread.title_full: Perfect spot for a family getaway - Review of Spier Hotel, Stellenbosch, South Africa - TripAdvisor

author: Kristina M
title: Perfect spot for a family getaway
text: Spent a perfectly relaxing weekend with my three kids. We rode bikes around the farm, had wine tasting, swam in the pool, picniced, saw the eagles, went to kids club, went to a concert - something for everyone. Staff are super friendly and professional We could have stayed much longer!
